LanguageData.Tool_Smartphone.label: smartphone
LanguageData.Tool_Smartphone.description: Smartphones make communications easier, are cheap, and widely available, but your pawns might have problems letting go. This exclusive version comes with a cyberware interface with multiport adapter, global hook detection, a cargobyte mpX list, and beats earphones, to make the day more enjoyable.\n\nPawns don't want to use this as a weapon, it counts as their equipment though.
